items.content_html: Noticed on the timeline this morning that numericcitizen posted a photo that looked familiar. I stood in the same spot and took a similar picture just a few months ago. I even highlighted it on my travel site exploretogether.lol
items.content_text:
![A stone archway features three carved figures above a black metal gate. The gate is partially open and secured with a chain. Inside the entrance, there are indistinct shapes of art displayed in a well-lit space. The surrounding walls are made of rough stone, suggesting an aged structure.](https://jomalo.com/uploads/2024/21dab4d144.jpeg) Noticed on the timeline this morning that [numericcitizen](https://micro.blog/numericcitizen) posted a photo that looked familiar. I stood in the same spot and took a similar picture just a few months ago. I even highlighted it on my travel site [exploretogether.lol](https://exploretogether.lol/2024/08/06/cruise-day-june.html)

1786. I'm always fascinated by very old architecture and ornaments or sculptures. #blackandwhite #blackandwhitephotography #architecture

Numeric Citizen https://pixelfed.social/p/numericcitizen/731667835778878452

items.content_html:
Cruise Day 12 - June 14 - Venice

üó∫
items.content_text:
[Cruise Day 12 - June 14 - Venice](https://exploretogether.lol/2024/08/10/cruise-day-june.html)

![A gondola with people seated is moving through a narrow canal flanked by historic buildings with balconies and windows in Venice with a stone bridge in the background. The buildings are decorated with flowers and lamps along the canal.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2670.jpeg)  

![Historical bridge over a narrow canal with gondolas passing below flanked by old buildings in Venice. Pale sky overhead. Text on a small green sign reads Servizio Gondole](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2664.jpeg)  

![The white stone bridge arches over a wide canal while people stand along its balustrade. A gondola passes beneath the bridge as buildings line both sides of the waterway under a clear blue sky.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2678.jpeg)  

![Three multi-story buildings with arched windows stand closely together under a bright sky creating a small plaza. One building has a balcony while shadows cast onto the facades. The architecture is reminiscent of historical European style with detailed stonework and classic design elements.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2684.jpeg)  

![A smiling man with a white beard and sunglasses sits close to a smiling woman with sunglasses while on a gondola ride steered by a standing gondolier in black uniform with a striped shirt in a Venetian canal surrounded by historic buildings with arched windows and balconies.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2689.jpeg)  

![A gondola moves through a narrow canal surrounded by tall, colorful buildings with arched windows in Venice. Another gondola is ahead, while red and white posts line the water‚Äôs edge, and a small arched pedestrian bridge is visible in the background.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2695.jpeg)  

![Gondolas are docked in front of historic buildings lining a canal in Venice under a clear blue sky](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2706.jpeg)  

![A multi-story, terracotta-colored building with arched windows and balconies stands beside a canal Several people are on the dock in front of the building, which has a distinct overhanging corner balcony The scene is set under a clear blue sky, with water and adjacent buildings visible.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2709.jpeg)  

![Large ornate stone building with arched windows standing still in daylight against a blue sky three flags hanging on the front facade European Union Italy Venice water visible at the base surrounded by additional structures to the side](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2714.jpeg)  

![A gondola navigates a narrow canal bordered by weathered, multi-story buildings with arched windows and balconies showing signs of deterioration under a clear blue sky. The gondola's prow, adorned with a small bouquet of red flowers, points towards the buildings.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2717.jpeg)  

![Rustic wooden door with an arched frame stands closed. The building facade is decayed with exposed bricks and weathered walls. Two barred windows flank the door. The lower part of the door and building is partially submerged in water, indicating possible flooding.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2720-edited.jpeg)  

![An ornate arched doorway leads into a building flanked by two wooden poles. Above the arch is a decorative iron railing with numerous potted plants. The lower part of the building is partially submerged in water indicating a Venetian canal setting. Signs on poles read Divieto di Approdo.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2722.jpeg)  

![Gondola floating on a canal passing beneath a stone arch bridge within a narrow waterway the gondola is in front of buildings with red and orange facades in Venice framed by blue sky and scattered clouds overhead.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2726.jpeg)  

![A multi-story, weathered brick and plaster building displays tall windows and signs of aging in an urban canal setting. A sign reads "PONTE DE LA CORTESIA". Bicycle graffiti decorates the lower wall. Narrow streets and adjacent buildings are visible in the background under a clear sky.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2729.jpeg)  

![A narrow canal features a gondola gliding through the water. Tall, historic buildings with weathered brick and arched windows line both sides of the canal. The sky is clear and blue, suggesting a sunny day. The scene is set in a tranquil, urban environment.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2730.jpeg)  

![A historic brick building with ornate balconies and arched windows stands alongside a narrow canal. A gondola floats on the water, and a small stone bridge connects both sides of the canal. The sky is clear with wispy clouds.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2734.jpeg)  

![A tall red-brick bell tower stands prominently, surrounded by an ornate cathedral with domes on the left and a long, white, neoclassical building on the right. Below, tourists walk and gather in a bustling plaza under a clear blue sky.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2744.jpeg)  

![A grand, intricately designed basilica with multiple arched portals, detailed carvings, and spired statues. The building exhibits classic Romanesque and Gothic architecture. The surrounding environment is open, with a clear blue sky as the backdrop.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2748.jpeg)  

![Terracotta rooftops are arranged close together creating a dense urban landscape. The rooftops have multiple chimneys and small windows while some buildings are painted in warm hues of orange and pink. The context includes other similar structures in the background under a partly cloudy sky.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2761.jpeg)  

üó∫

items.content_html:
Cruise Day 10 - June 12 - Split

üó∫
items.content_text:
[Cruise Day 10 - June 12 - Split](https://exploretogether.lol/2024/08/08/cruise-day-june.html)

![A historic stone bell tower rises above an old stone fortification The foreground features several stone buildings with small windows and tiled roofs The sky is filled with scattered clouds](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4367-converted.jpeg)  

![A weathered stone building facade with two windows and a damaged column. Small plants grow from the cracks in the aged brickwork, indicating neglect. The partially restored wall and visible wear on the column suggest a historical or ancient structure in an urban environment.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4251-converted.jpeg)

![An ancient stone archway stands firm, illuminated by two small lamps in a dim underground chamber with brick and stone walls and a low ceiling. The setting appears historical, evoking a sense of antiquity and mystery.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4253-converted.jpeg)

![A rectangular stone slab is elevated on a metallic stand within an ancient stone structure featuring arched and rough stone walls. The space is lit in such a way that the texture of the stones is highlighted and shadows are cast, emphasizing the historic ambiance.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4273-converted.jpeg)  

![An ancient stone walkway leads through a narrow, arched passageway flanked by high, weathered stone walls. The path is paved and leads into a small, sunlit courtyard visible in the distance. The surroundings suggest an old, possibly historic, structure.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4293-converted.jpeg)  

![Stone archway with a small, dark entrance in a weathered stone wall. Overgrown plants cascade from the top and crevices of the wall. The ground is paved, appearing damp or polished, and a small section of a modern concrete drain grate is visible at the bottom left.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4299-converted.jpeg)  

![Stone bench rests in a narrow underground passage. Light reflects off the wet floor, and the high, arched ceiling is constructed of irregular stones. Dim, wall-mounted lights illuminate the rough brick walls and arched windows, creating a shadowy, humid environment.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4313-converted.jpeg)  

![A tall, ornate tower rises against a partly cloudy sky, seen from below. Surrounding the tower are old, textured stone walls with visible rough bricks.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4327-converted.jpeg)  

![Stone wall showcasing large, irregular rocks positioned horizontally above and below thin, uniform bricks. The stones exhibit a rough texture indicating natural wear, and the arrangement hints at historical or rustic construction methods. The bricks add structured contrast to the organic shapes amid a weathered facade.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4353-converted.jpeg)  

![Old stone building with arched windows and doors standing among ancient stone walls in an open courtyard. Sign reading "ETNOGRAFSKI MUZEJ SPLIT" displayed on one part of the structure beneath images of soccer players and a chessboard. Sky partly cloudy overhead.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4355-converted.jpeg)  

![A bar-covered window overlooks an outdoor caf√© with empty tables and chairs surrounded by potted plants and palm trees in a sunny urban setting. A large white building stands in the background against a clear sky.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2212-converted.jpeg)  

![An ancient stone archway adorned with a mix of light and dark stones frames a view of a gated window. The window grid reveals potted plants and an outdoor area with some structures in the distance. The surrounding walls appear old and weathered.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4363-converted.jpeg)  

![A narrow alleyway with a stone-paved walkway is flanked by old stone buildings. An aged, wooden door at the end is framed by stone walls. A trash bin sits on the right side. The building on the left displays the number 5 which is slightly above a door.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4371-converted.jpeg)  

![Narrow alleyway bordered by tall, weathered stone walls on both sides. The left wall has dark stains and exposed bricks, while the right wall is blurred and textured. Overhead, wires and cables hang. The paved path has a manhole cover, leading into the distance.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4373-converted.jpeg)  

![Narrow stone-paved alley bordered by high stone walls with an arched entrance at the end partially lit from above by daylight shining through gaps in the roofing](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4381-converted.jpeg)  

![Narrow cobblestone alleyway extends between tall, old stone buildings on either side sunlight filtering through. No visible people, but there are window bars and electrical wires along the walls. At the far end, there is an opening suggesting a brighter, possibly busier street beyond.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4389-converted.jpeg)  

![Monument stands tall amidst trees on a rocky shore overlooking a vast cityscape nestled between mountains on a partly cloudy day and there are low and medium-rise buildings throughout the urban area with the sea at the bottom right](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4408-converted.jpeg)  

![A bearded man and a woman stand close together smiling at the camera. They are outdoors, facing a calm body of water, with hills and a coastal village visible in the distant background. The image is in grayscale.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4430-converted.jpeg)  

üó∫

items.content_html:
Cruise Day 9 - June 11 - Kotor

üó∫
items.content_text:
[Cruise Day 9 - June 11 - Kotor](https://exploretogether.lol/2024/08/07/cruise-day-june.html)

![A large cruise ship near a coastline with small buildings in the foreground. The towering, rocky mountains dominate the background, covered partially by low-hanging clouds, creating a dramatic and impressive landscape. The water reflects the natural scenery, enhancing the scene's serene atmosphere.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4163-original.jpeg)  

![Two small islands one with a church and the other densely covered with trees float on a calm water body surrounded by tall rugged mountains beneath a cloudy sky. A tiny settlement is visible at the base of the mountains in the background.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-3911.jpeg)  

![Rippling water trail suggests a moving boat in a calm fjord surrounded by rugged mountains under a cloudy sky with small settlements visible along both shores.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-3919-original.jpeg)  

![Rocky mountains are covered in patches of vegetation. The peaks rise steeply against a sky partially filled with scattered clouds. The sunlight casts shadows, highlighting the rugged texture of the mountain slopes. The environment is serene and untouched, evoking a sense of natural majesty and isolation.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-3940-original.jpeg)  

![A large cruise ship named Celebrity Constellation moored on calm water with smoke emitting from its stack. The ship features multiple decks and lifeboats. Surrounding the ship are rugged, mountainous terrains under a partly cloudy sky.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-3955.jpeg)  

![Stone building with a red-tiled roof stands by the water surrounded by tall green trees and a stone wall under a cloudy sky reflecting in the calm water](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-3981.jpeg)  

![Stone church building with a domed bell tower stands on a waterfront cobblestone platform surrounded by mountains and under a cloudy sky. Some boats are docked by the shoreline, and bushes are present near the church's entrance.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4001.jpeg)  

![A historic stone church with an ornate round window and domed tower stands against a partly cloudy sky. Carved religious figures adorn the facade. The structure's weathered appearance suggests age and significance, evoking a sense of antiquity and solemnity.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4005-original.jpeg)  

![A stone building with a dome and a tower stands amid expansive mountains and water under a partly cloudy sky. Sturdy stonework surrounds the structure, featuring a spherical decoration on a pillar.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4015-original.jpeg)  

![Rough, textured walls form a cave-like tunnel in a rock formation with a still water surface below. The concrete wall at the far end displays various graffiti, and others in different handwriting styles.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4047-original.jpeg)  

![People sitting on a boat move through a large tunnel made of concrete. The tunnel opens up to reveal a distant cityscape with buildings near a mountainous area.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4049-original.jpeg)  

![Steel webbed structures form a fragmented canopy with debris clinging onto them appearing damaged amidst robust concrete supports against a backdrop of a cloudy sky giving an impression of ruin and decay possibly post-apocalyptic or war-torn environment.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4055-original.jpeg)  

![A large sailboat with three masts is sailing on choppy waters with cloudy skies overhead and a distant, hilly coastline in the background.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4082.jpeg)  

![Stone clock tower stands tall surrounded by stone houses with red-tiled roofs Mountains blanketed with green forest in the background Stone fortification structure elevated on the hillside completing the picturesque village scene](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4108.jpeg)  

![Stone building with arched windows and a small balcony with a wrought-iron railing. The building stands in a rustic setting with a couple of palm trees visible in the foreground. The sky overhead is cloudy.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4117-original.jpeg)  

![A bicycle rests against a stone wall in a narrow, cobblestone alley. Surrounding the alley are old stone buildings with shuttered windows and arched doorways. Potted plants and a wooden table are placed along the walls, creating a quaint and historic ambiance under a cloudy sky.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2204.jpeg)  

![Stone steps ascending between two tall brick walls in a narrow alleyway with plants and a lantern placed near the entrance. The bright sky and distant building are visible at the far end of the passageway.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4135-original.jpeg)  

![Coastal town bordered by a calm sea on one side and steep, green mountains on the other numerous buildings with red-tiled roofs stretching along the shoreline scattered boats on the water cloudy blue sky in the background](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-4212.jpeg)  

![Lush green hill stands tall edged by rocky cliffs with a road winding near its base several cars are driving a historic stone building with a red roof rests near the waterfront calm blue waters stretch into the distance bordered by hills and a few boats navigate the serene bay](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-2209.jpeg)  

üó∫

items.content_html:
Cruise Day 8 - June 10 - Dubrovnik

üó∫
items.content_text:
[Cruise Day 8 - June 10 - Dubrovnik](https://exploretogether.lol/2024/08/06/cruise-day-june.html)

![Stone fortress standing atop a rugged cliff overlooking a vast, calm ocean with waves gently lapping the rocky shore under a clear blue sky](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-1527.jpeg)  

![An old stone building with a detailed, circular window and arched entrance stands among other historic structures, adjacent to a steep stairway leading uphill, where people are climbing steps. The backdrop features a hillside with remnants of ancient walls and architecture.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-0637.jpeg)  

![A narrow, cobbled alleyway bordered by rustic stone walls and buildings with shuttered windows and tiled roofs; a small tree grows in the center, adding greenery to the serene, historical environment. Paths and remnants of old structures create an aged, scenic ambiance.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-1516.jpeg)  

![A sailboat with a white sail is moving across a blue ocean. The vessel is heading towards a distant, green, forested island with a rocky shoreline. It is a sunny day with clear skies and sparkling water.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-0710.jpeg)  

![Small stone building with a closed round window above a boarded-up door is situated in front of a larger stone building with multiple windows and white shutters ramp leading to the small building cobblestone ground surrounding both buildings adding to the historic appearance of the scene.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-1022.jpeg)  

![Stone fortress wall lining rocky coastline with waves crashing at its base people walk atop the wall overlooking a distant mountainous landscape and a boat on the sea bathed in sunlight clear skies above.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-0860.jpeg)

![A vast, double-peaked Mount Vesuvius dominates the background while a dense cityscape with numerous buildings lies in the foreground near a waterfront under a cloudy sky.](https://exploretogether.lol/uploads/2024/img-1668.jpeg)

items.content_html:
Our First Cruise Complete

We finally made it home from our cruise around Italy, Croatia, and Montenegro in the early hours of Sunday morning.

I had hoped to post daily with some photos and a short write up of the day. I did manage to record some notes about each day so but here was never the time to sort through the many, many, photos taken. The on-board Wi-Fi was less than stellar and it was all I could do to make sure the photos were backed up to the cloud. This becomes very important later.

Now that we are back into our regular daily rhythm I will be posting each day over the next couple of weeks to exploretogether.lol, created as a place to keep of record of our travels and upload our photos as we hope to make a habit of getting away more often now that our girls are grown.

items.content_html:
The Perfect Album

I don’t know if any album is perfect but there are some that speak to me.

Queensr√øche - Operation: Mindcrime

  • A concept album released in 1988, the year I graduated high school. A couple of years later as the band was touring on their next album, Empire, I was able to hear/see Operation: Mindcrime performed in its entirety live

Dixie Dregs - Bring ‘Em Back Alive

  • Recorded live in Atlanta and released in 1992. I was introduced to this band by a roommate in college, not a band I had heard before but quickly became a staple in the CD player

Both of these albums are on my phone and are still listened to quite often.

Queensr√øche - Operation: Mindcrime

items.content_html:
Why Can’t I Have Nice Things

Major software upgrade testing is going just about as expected.

It worked last week. It doesn’t today. Updates to a couple of procedures is now preventing a clean database creation.

Confirmed with the developer the logs are clean but the tables are not being created. It works for him, just not for me.

No word yet from the database admin. Is it the network or new security policies that no one has been made aware of.

Major software upgrade testing is going just about as expected.

Confirmed with the developer the logs are clean but the tables are not being created. It works for him, just not for me. 

No word yet from the database admin. Is it the network or new security policies that no one has been made aware of.

items.content_html:
Communication - What is it Good For

While at work this morning we started to see random issues, a web page wouldn’t load or a login failed only to then work with a refresh or a second login attempt. Everything thing seemed a little slower.

And then nothing works, meaning no one works, outside of IT. Most of us are at a standstill, absolutely nothing can be done offline.

No attempts to let anyone know what the issue may be or why this is happening. I know no internet means no email but oddly one, we have two, internal messaging system still works. Also no phone calls, they still work, at least get the word out so managers or supervisors can let people know what is going on.

We sort of migrated to teams a few months ago. And by sort of I mean, the icon appeared on the desktop so some departments began using it. It has never officially been released. Other departments still cling to the old system.

We are now over 2 hours in to this outage and rumors are starting:

  • server room has no power (my office is across the hall from the server room it is as loud as ever)
  • Were we hacked again (several years ago we were hit with a cyberattack that took is offline for almost 2 weeks)

Email just came back up and the first thing I see is a Major Incident Notification sent over an hour ago for an impact to email in my inbox. Who was going to see this when email is down??

Still no internal systems or databases.

Communication is not this companies strong suit.

#weblogpomo2024

# Communication - What is it Good For 

While at work this morning we started to see random issues, a web page wouldn't load or a login failed only to then work with a refresh or a second login attempt. Everything thing seemed a little slower. 

And then nothing works, meaning no one works, outside of IT. Most of us are at a standstill, absolutely nothing can be done offline. 

No attempts to let anyone know what the issue may be or why this is happening. I know no internet means no email but oddly one, we have two, internal messaging system still works. Also no phone calls, they still work, at least get the word out so managers or supervisors can let people know what is going on. 

We *sort of* migrated to teams a few months ago. And by sort of I mean, the icon appeared on the desktop so some departments began using it. It has never officially been released. Other departments still cling to the old system. 

We are now over 2 hours in to this outage and rumors are starting: 
- server room has no power (my office is across the hall from the server room it is as loud as ever)
- Were we hacked again (several years ago we were hit with a cyberattack that took is offline for almost 2 weeks)

Email just came back up and the first thing I see is a **Major Incident Notification** sent over an hour ago for an impact to email in my inbox. Who was going to see this when email is down??

Still no internal systems or databases. 

Communication is not this companies strong suit. 

#weblogpomo2024

items.content_html:
Preparing for Summer

At the end of last season we needed to move our trailer to a new spot. It was settled into a temporary home and was closed up for the winter. Our own piece of land, a new permanent home for our trailer is in the works, waiting on the lawyers.

Opening it this year has a few challenges.

We spent last Saturday doing a complete spring cleaning of the trailer while checking for any new damage and/or leaks and sorting out our power and water hookups as they much farther away this year. We will also need to go back to using the local “facilities” as there will no longer be a sewer connection.

Tonight we take our golf cart and a full truck back to the trailer.

It usually takes three or four weekends with the truck packed full each time to get everything back up. Hopefully our new trailer home be arranged this year and will have our own storage so we no longer need to bring so much back to our house.

#weblogpomo2024

items.content_html:
Getting Started

I have had my Micro.blog account for years, on the free plan for most of that, but never really posted with any regularity until I switched to a paid account year ago. Still not much of a blogger, I would rather find something to photograph and share than to try and organize my thoughts into coherent sentences.

I have always struggled with what to say, I still do, but I see the message of so many blog to just write for yourself

With this Weblog Posting Month I am trying to change that. There will still be lots of photos but I will be trying to use my words more. Sorry about that.

#weblogpomo2024

items.title: SpringBoard
items.content_html:
Following in the footsteps of others - otavio, maique, and gabz,

Questionnaire

  • What is the first app you open in the morning?
    • Usually The Weather Network or Spark.
  • What is an app you can‚Äôt live without?
    • Gluon, Drafts are probably my most used.
  • Is there a game app you play during breaks or in your free time?
    • Not normally a games person. I do have Monument Valley 2 is installed, but I cannot remember the last time the app was opened.
  • What is the most recent app you‚Äôve downloaded, and why?
    • Holafly was just downloaded. Preparing for a Cruise around Italy in June.
  • What is the most fun or entertaining app you‚Äôve discovered recently?
    • Vernissage, a simple Pixelfed client that is focused on showcasing and sharing photos with almost no user interface.
  • Which app helps you stay connected with friends and family the most?
    • The Messages app for 95% and Messenger for a few that cannot seem to let go of Facebook.
  • Which app do you use to relax or unwind after a busy day?
    • Overcast, Music or Books.
  • What‚Äôs the phone you currently have?
    • It‚Äôs an iPhone 14 Pro Max (Deep Purple). I have had a large screen going back to the iPhone 6 plus, not sure I could go back toa smaller screen.
  • Do you prefer light mode or dark mode?
    • The display is set to automatically switch but anywhere photos are involved the app will be set to always be in Dark Mode.
  • What can you tell us about the wallpaper you‚Äôre using?
    • It is my own photo of the Sail art installation, by Eduardo Tresoldi, on the Halifax, NS waterfront.

What‚Äôs SpringBoard?

SpringBoard is the standard application that manages the iPhone‚Äôs home screen ‚Äì Wikipedia
items.content_text:
Following in the footsteps of others - [otavio](https://otavio.cc/springboard/), [maique](https://maique.eu/2023/12/21/springboard.html), and [gabz](https://gabz.blog/2023/12/21/my-springboard.html), 

<!--more-->

![On the left an image of a deep purple iPhone 14 Pro Max lock screen wallpaper showing two silhouetted figures standing before a large illuminated wireframe sculpture at night.
On the right the same iPhone 14 Pro Max displaying the SpringBoard with various app icons and widgets for reminders and vacation planning.](https://jomalo.com/uploads/2023/14a678fb-066e-40bf-8a8b-1c2ac4799333.png)

Questionnaire  

- What is the first app you open in the morning?  
  - Usually The Weather Network or Spark.  
- What is an app you can‚Äôt live without?
  - Gluon, Drafts are probably my most used.  
- Is there a game app you play during breaks or in your free time?
  - Not normally a games person. I do have Monument Valley 2 is installed, but I cannot remember the last time the app was opened.  
- What is the most recent app you‚Äôve downloaded, and why?
  - Holafly was just downloaded. Preparing for a Cruise around Italy in June.
- What is the most fun or entertaining app you‚Äôve discovered recently?  
  - Vernissage, a simple Pixelfed client that is focused on showcasing and sharing photos with almost no user interface.  
- Which app helps you stay connected with friends and family the most?  
  - The Messages app for 95% and Messenger for a few that cannot seem to let go of Facebook.  
- Which app do you use to relax or unwind after a busy day?  
  - Overcast, Music or Books.  
- What‚Äôs the phone you currently have?  
  - It‚Äôs an iPhone 14 Pro Max (Deep Purple). I have had a large screen going back to the iPhone 6 plus, not sure I could go back toa smaller screen.  
- Do you prefer light mode or dark mode?  
  - The display is set to automatically switch but anywhere photos are involved the app will be set to always be in Dark Mode.  
- What can you tell us about the wallpaper you‚Äôre using?  
  - It is my own photo of the Sail art installation, by Eduardo Tresoldi, on the Halifax, NS waterfront.  

- - - 

What‚Äôs SpringBoard?

> SpringBoard is the standard application that manages the iPhone‚Äôs home screen ‚Äì [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SpringBoard)

items.content_text:
# What I am using:  

A work in progress documenting my devices and systems.  

## Mobile  
- iPhone 14 Pro Max  
- 256 GB  
- Deep Purple  

## Laptop  
- MacBook Air M1  
- Space grey  
- 16 GB RAM  
- 1 TB  

## Server  
- Mac mini M1  
- 16 GB RAM  
- 512 GB SSD  
- 24.5 TB DAS
- PLEX  
  - occasional "work from home" system

## TV  
- TV 4K (1st gen)  
- TV HD  

## Watch  
- Apple Watch Ultra  

## iPad  
- iPad Mini WiFI+Cellular 1st generation  
  - iOS 9.3.6  
- iPad 4th generation  
  - iOS 10.3.3  

- - -  
## Non Apple Servers  

#### Home:  
- Raspberry PI 4 4GB:  
  - Open Media Vault (Docker host)  
      - AdGuard Home (primary)  
- HP 280 G2 SFF:  
  - 8 GB RAM  
  - 256GB SSD  
  - 8 TB HD  
  - Win 10  
      - PLEX (Kids)  
      - Time Machine  
- Lenovo ThinkCentre M73 SFF:  
  - 8 GB RAM  
  - 120 GB SSD  
  - 8 TB HD  
  - Open Media Vault (Docker host)  
      - AdGuard Home (secondary)  
      - Duplicati *(testing)*  
      - Home assistant  
      - JellyFin *(testing)*  

#### Trailer:  
- Lenovo ThinkCentre M92p Micro:  
  - 8 GB RAM  
  - 512 GB SSD  
  - Open Media Vault (Docker host)  
      - AdGuard Home (primary)  
      - Duplicati *(testing)*  
      - PLEX  
      - JellyFin *(testing)*

Microblogvember is over and so is the daily pressure to post.

I have always wanted to blog but never thought I had much to say. After re-reading these posts I am hoping this challenge and will keep my on the path and maybe, someday there will be something worth reading.
items.content_text:
[Microblogvember](https://micro.blog/discover/mbnov) is over and so is the daily pressure to post.

I have always wanted to blog but never thought I had much to say.  After re-reading these [posts](https://jomalo.com/categories/microblogvember/) I am hoping this challenge and will keep my on the path and maybe, someday there will be something worth reading.

items.content_html: Even though we shutdown the trailer weeks ago, it is hard to get over our Friday night ritual of jumping in the truck and heading out as soon as we get home from work.
items.content_text: Even though we shutdown the trailer weeks ago, it is hard to get over our Friday night *ritual* of jumping in the truck and heading out as soon as we get home from work.

items.content_html: I recently pulled the pin on an update to the Apple Watch Ultra. Moving from my Series 3, anything would have been better but the extra battery life, larger size and more durable case were the biggest draws for me.
items.content_text: I recently pulled the pin on an *update* to the Apple Watch Ultra. Moving from my Series 3, anything would have been better but the extra battery life, larger size and more durable case were the biggest draws for me.

items.content_html: In my younger days I used to work as a line cook in a busy restaurant. No real chance for a break so we would graze on our shift on “mistakes”. Oops… extra chicken fingers were prepared or I thought you ordered 2 cheeseburgers.

items.content_html: I find myself stuck in a loop. Every year as winter approaches I say to myself: I want to learn to code, I start some training, realize I don’t have the time, repeat.

NASA’s InSight Mars lander took this final selfie on April 24, 2022, the 1,211th Martian day, or sol, of the mission. The lander is covered with far more dust than it was in its first selfie, taken in December 2018, not long after landing…
